======Changes skins on beta drones.======

= Description =

Enables the possibility of having skins on a beta drone and beta drone jumper. It simply add the possibility of randomly having them. This cvar was added to change the beta drone skin while [[asw_drone_beta_skin.wiki|asw_drone_beta_skin]] was enabled.

==== Example ====

Beta drone default skin
<img align=center src=drone_beta_skin0.png /></a>

Beta drone new skin 
<img align=center src=drone_beta_skin1.png /></a>

Beta drone default skin has wings
<img align=center src=drone_beta_skin2.png /></a>

Beta drone new skin has wings
<img align=center src=drone_beta_skin3.png /></a>
